Markers.EurekaCoffers.Name: Eureka Bunny Coffers
Markers.EurekaCoffers.Description: Shows world markers for the Bunny Coffers in the Eureka zones after you've used the Lucky Carrot item. Please note that this feature currently only works for English game clients.
Markers.EurekaCoffers.EnableMapMarkers.N: Enable map markers for detected coffers
Markers.EurekaCoffers.EnableMapMarkers.D: Adds map markers for detected Eureka Bunny Coffer locations. Note that this feature is unavailable if the Eureka Linker plugin is also installed and enabled, since it also provides similar functionality.
Markers.Fate.Name: FATE Markers
Markers.Fate.Description: Shows world markers for the active FATEs in the current zone.
Markers.Flag.Name: Flag Marker
Markers.Flag.Description: Shows a world marker for the placed flag in the current zone.
Markers.GatheringNodes.Name: Gathering Node Markers
Markers.GatheringNodes.Description: Shows world markers for the active gathering nodes around you.
Markers.Hunt.Name: Hunt Markers
Markers.Hunt.Description: Shows world markers for the C/B/A/S/SS-rank mobs in the current zone.
Markers.Quest.Name: Quest Objective Markers
Markers.Quest.Description: Shows world markers for objectives of active quests in the current zone.
Markers.TripleTriad.Name: Triple Triad Card Markers
Markers.TripleTriad.Description: Shows world markers for unobtained Triple Triad cards in the current zone.
Markers.TripleTriad.ShowLockedCards.Name: Show locked cards
Markers.TripleTriad.ShowLockedCards.Desc: Shows markers for cards that are locked behind incomplete quests or other requirements.
Settings.Window.Title: Umbra Settings
Settings.AppearanceModule.Name: Appearance
Settings.AppearanceModule.Fonts.Name: Font Configuration
Settings.AppearanceModule.Fonts.Descript: Customize the fonts used by Umbra.
The default font that is used for most texts.
Settings.AppearanceModule.Fonts.Monospac: The monospace font is used for texts that require fixed-width characters, such as the clock.
Settings.AppearanceModule.Fonts.Emphasis: The emphasis font is typically used for decorative texts in some toolbar widgets
The currently active color profile. Your active profile is: {0}
A unique name to describe a new color profile. Use the create button to create a new profile with the given name. The new profile will be based on the currently active profile.
Allow the imported profile to overwrite the an existing profile with the same name.
You can now paste the color profile of "{0}" into a text file or share it with others.
Settings.AppearanceModule.ImportError.In: Invalid color profile format. The text in your clipboard is not a valid color profile for Umbra.
Settings.AppearanceModule.ImportError.No: No color profile found in the imported data. The text in your clipboard does not contain a color profile for Umbra.
Settings.AppearanceModule.ImportError.Du: A color profile with the same name already exists. Please choose a different name in the "New profile name" field or enable the overwrite option.
Settings.MarkersModule.Name: World Markers
Settings.MarkersModule.Config.Enabled.Na: Show markers of this type in the game world
Settings.MarkersModule.Config.ShowOnComp: Show direction indicator when out of view
Settings.MarkersModule.Config.FadeDistan: The distance in yalms between your character and the marker at which it fades out.
Settings.MarkersModule.Config.FadeAttenu: An added range to the configured fade distance from which the marker will start to fade out.
Settings.WidgetsModule.Name: Toolbar Widgets
Settings.WidgetsModule.DeleteWidget: Remove this widget and its instance settings. This operation cannot be undone.
Settings.WidgetsModule.EditWidget: Edit instance settings of this widget
Settings.WidgetsModule.MoveToLeft: Move this widget to the left side
Settings.WidgetsModule.MoveToCenter: Move this widget to the center
Settings.WidgetsModule.MoveToRight: Move this widget to the right side
Settings.WidgetsModule.DangerHint: Hold SHIFT to enable dangerous buttons
Settings.ProfilesModule.Name: Config Profiles
Settings.ProfilesModule.ActiveProfile.De: The currently active profile. Changes to the settings will be saved to this profile. The active profile is associated with the current character and will be loaded automatically when you log in. Some settings may require a plugin reload to take effect.
Settings.ProfilesModule.CreateProfile.De: Creates a new profile with the given name. The name must be unique and must not contain any non-alphanumeric characters. The current settings will be copied over to the newly created profile. Some settings may require a plugin reload to take effect.
Settings.ProfilesModule.CopyProfile.Name: Copy profile
Settings.ProfilesModule.CopyProfile.Desc: Copies all settings from the selected profile to the active profile. This includes every Umbra-related setting, including but not limited to: General settings, Toolbar widgets, Saved appearances (including themes). Some settings may require a plugin reload to take effect.
Settings.ProfilesModule.DeleteProfile.De: Deletes the selected profile and all its associated settings. The default profile cannot be deleted. This operation cannot be undone. Deleting the currently active profile will revert the active profile back to the default one.
Settings.ProfilesModule.ActiveProfile.Ex: You can now paste the profile data into a text file or share it with others.
Settings.AddWidgetWindow.Title: Add Widget
CVAR.Markers.Compass.Enabled.Name: Enable Compass
CVAR.Markers.Compass.Enabled.Description: Whether to show the compass that indicates the direction of markers that are currently out of view.
CVAR.Markers.Compass.Radius.Name: Compass Radius
CVAR.Markers.Compass.Radius.Description: The radius of the compass in pixels. The compass is an imaginary circular element around your character that shows the direction of markers that are currently out of view.
CVAR.Markers.Compass.IconScaleFactor.Des: The scale factor of the icons on the compass. This value is a percentage of the default size.
CVAR.Markers.Compass.IconOpacity.Name: Compass Icon Opacity
CVAR.Markers.Compass.IconOpacity.Descrip: The opacity of the icons on the compass. 100 is fully opaque, 0 is fully transparent.
CVAR.Markers.Renderer.Enabled.Name: Enable 3D Markers
CVAR.Markers.Renderer.Enabled.Descriptio: Whether to show markers in the game world.
The distance in yalms at which markers are grouped together into a single marker. This can help reduce clutter when there are many markers in the same area.
CVAR.Markers.Renderer.MaxWidth.Name: Max text width
CVAR.Markers.Renderer.MaxWidth.Descripti: The maximum width of a marker in pixels. Increase this value to show more text on markers if it gets cut off too often.
CVAR.General.UiScale.Name: UI Scale
CVAR.General.UiScale.Description: The interface scale factor for all Umbra elements. This value is a percentage of the default size. Hit enter to apply the given value. Note that input elements are not affected by this setting. Use the global font scaling setting in Dalamud settings for those instead.
CVAR.General.LanguageOverride.Name: Language Override (Reloads the plugin)
CVAR.General.LanguageOverride.Descriptio: Overrides Dalamud's language setting for Umbra. Note that this only affects Umbra-specific translations. Texts that come from the game itself will still be shown in the game's language. Modifying this value will reload the plugin, causing the settings window to close.
CVAR.General.EnableImageProcessing.Name: Enable image processing on some icon elements
CVAR.General.EnableImageProcessing.Descr: Performs some image manipulation on some icons to improve their appearance. You may want to disable this if you have custom icon packs installed. Modifying this value will restart the plugin to invalidate caches. This causes the settings window to close itself.
CVAR.General.ShowInCutscenes.Name: Show Umbra elements in cutscenes
CVAR.General.ShowInGPose.Name: Show Umbra elements while GPose is active
CVAR.General.ShowOnUserHide.Name: Show Umbra elements when the UI is manually hidden
CVAR.General.ShowBetweenAreas.Name: Show Umbra elements during loading screens
CVAR.General.ShowDuringIdleCam.Name: Show Umbra elements during idle camera (AFK) mode
CVAR.General.ShowInDuty.Name: Show Umbra elements in duties
CVAR.General.ShowInCombat.Name: Show Umbra elements during combat
CVAR.Window.EnableClipping.Name: Enable window clipping
CVAR.Window.EnableClipping.Description: Allows windows to render behind native game windows. This may have a slight performance cost and may not work properly for all native game windows. Note that this feature does not work when Multi-monitor support is enabled in Dalamud settings.
CVAR.Toolbar.Enabled.Name: Enable the toolbar
CVAR.Toolbar.Enabled.Description: Whether to display the toolbar. Use the "/umbra" command to open the settings window if you decide to disable the toolbar.
CVAR.Toolbar.IsTopAligned.Name: Place the toolbar at the top of the screen.
CVAR.Toolbar.IsTopAligned.Description: Aligns the toolbar to the top of the screen rather than the bottom.
CVAR.Toolbar.IsStretched.Name: Stretch the toolbar to the screen edges
CVAR.Toolbar.IsStretched.Description: Stretches the toolbar to the left and right edges of the screen.
CVAR.Toolbar.IsAutoHideEnabled.Name: Automatically hide the toolbar
CVAR.Toolbar.IsAutoHideEnabled.Descripti: Hides the toolbar when the mouse cursor is not near it. The toolbar will reappear when the mouse cursor is near the toolbar.
CVAR.Toolbar.ItemSpacing.Name: Toolbar widget spacing
CVAR.Toolbar.ItemSpacing.Description: Defines the distance between toolbar widgets in pixels.
CVAR.Toolbar.EnableShadow.Name: Enable toolbar shadow
CVAR.Toolbar.EnableShadow.Description: Adds a soft shadow to the toolbar to make it stand out more.
CVAR.Toolbar.EnableInactiveColors.Name: Enable inactive color
CVAR.Toolbar.EnableInactiveColors.Descri: Changes the color of the toolbar when the mouse cursor is not near it. Use the 'inactive' colors in the color profile to customize this appearance.
CVAR.Toolbar.MarginLeft.Name: Toolbar left margin
CVAR.Toolbar.MarginLeft.Description: The distance between the left edge of the screen and the toolbar in pixels.
CVAR.Toolbar.MarginRight.Name: Toolbar right margin
CVAR.Toolbar.MarginRight.Description: The distance between the right edge of the screen and the toolbar in pixels.
CVAR.Toolbar.YOffset.Name: Toolbar vertical offset
CVAR.Toolbar.YOffset.Description: The vertical offset of the toolbar from the top or bottom of the screen in pixels.
Widget.Accessibility.Name: Accessibility
Widget.Accessibility.Description: Provides you with quick access to accessibility features.
Widget.Accessibility.Config.Decorate.Des: Decorates the accessibility widget with a background and border.
The vertical offset of the text from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the text down, negative values move the text up.
The vertical offset of the mail icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.BattleEffects.Name: Battle Effects Configurator
Widget.BattleEffects.Description: Provides you with options to quickly change the intensity of battle effects, as well as pet sizes of summoners.
Widget.BattleEffects.Config.Decorate.Des: Decorates the accessibility widget with a background and border.
The vertical offset of the mail icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.Clock.Name: Clock
Widget.Clock.Description: Displays the current local, server or Eorzea time with lots of customization options.
Widget.Clock.Config.TextYOffset.Name: Text vertical offset
Widget.Clock.Config.TextYOffset.Descript: The vertical offset of the clock text from the center of the clock in pixels. Positive values move the text down, negative values move the text up.
Widget.Clock.Config.ShowSeconds.Name: Show seconds
Widget.Clock.Config.ShowSeconds.Descript: Whether to show the seconds part of the clock.
Widget.Clock.Config.ClickToSwitch.Name: Enable click to switch time source
Widget.Clock.Config.ClickToSwitch.Descri: Allows you to switch between local, server and Eorzea time by clicking on the clock. A tooltip will show the current time source when hovering over the clock while this option is enabled.
Widget.Clock.Config.Use24HourFormat.Name: Use 24-hour format
Widget.Clock.Config.Use24HourFormat.Desc: Whether to use a 24-hour format for the clock. If disabled, the clock will use a 12-hour format with AM/PM indicators.
Widget.Clock.Config.UseCustomPrefix.Name: Use custom prefix text
Widget.Clock.Config.UseCustomPrefix.Desc: Whether to use a custom text before the clock time. Uses the default game glyphs based on the time source if disabled.
Widget.Clock.Config.Decorate.Name: Decorate the widget
Widget.Clock.Config.Decorate.Description: Decorates the clock widget with a background and border.
Widget.Clock.Config.PrefixText.Name: Prefix text
Widget.Clock.Config.PrefixText.Descripti: Text that is displayed before the clock time. This can be used to add a label to the clock, for example: 'LT', 'ST' or 'ET'.
Widget.Clock.Config.TimeSource.Name: Time source
Widget.Clock.Config.TimeSource.Descripti: The source of the time that is displayed on the clock.
Widget.Clock.Config.AmLabel.Name: AM label
Widget.Clock.Config.AmLabel.Description: The text that is displayed for the AM part of the clock when using a 12-hour format.
Widget.Clock.Config.PmLabel.Name: PM label
Widget.Clock.Config.PmLabel.Description: The text that is displayed for the PM part of the clock when using a 12-hour format.
Widget.Clock.Config.CustomWidth.Name: Custom time display width
Widget.Clock.Config.CustomWidth.Descript: The width of the clock text in pixels. If set to 0, the width will be calculated automatically based on the text content. You may want to choose a fixed with when you use a custom monospace font that does not have fixed-width characters to prevent the widget from resizing when the time changes.
Widget.Location.Name: Location
Widget.Location.Description: Displays the current map and area name.
Widget.Location.Config.TextAlign.Name: Text alignment
Widget.Location.Config.TextAlign.Descrip: The alignment of the location text.
Widget.DtrBar.Name: Server Info Bar
Widget.DtrBar.Description: Displays a group of widgets that originate from the In-game server info bar.
Widget.DtrBar.Config.DecorateMode.Name: Decorate mode
Widget.DtrBar.Config.DecorateMode.Descri: Determines when server info bar entries should be decorated with a background and border.
Widget.DtrBar.Config.PlainText.Name: Show items as plain text
Widget.DtrBar.Config.PlainText.Descripti: Shows the items as plain text without any decoration such as custom colors and icons. Enabling this option will increase performance.
Widget.DtrBar.Config.TextYOffset.Name: Text vertical offset
Widget.DtrBar.Config.TextYOffset.Descrip: The vertical offset of the text from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the text down, negative values move the text up.
Widget.DtrBar.Config.HideNative.Name: Auto-hide the native server info bar
Widget.DtrBar.Config.HideNative.Descript: Hides the native server info bar when the server info bar widget is visible. The native server info bar will be shown again when the widget is no longer visible.
Widget.DtrBar.Config.ItemSpacing.Name: Item spacing
Widget.DtrBar.Config.ItemSpacing.Descrip: The distance between server info bar items in pixels.
Widget.Spacer.Name: Spacer
Widget.Spacer.Description: A simple spacer with a configurable width that can be used to separate other widgets.
Widget.Spacer.Config.Width.Name: Additional width
Widget.Spacer.Config.Width.Description: The extra width of the distance between widgets in pixels. Widget spacing in Toolbar customization settings is always taken into account, regardless of this setting.
Widget.MailIndicator.Name: Unread Mail Indicator
Widget.MailIndicator.Description: Shows a small mail icon when you have unread mail.
Widget.MailIndicator.Tooltip.Singular: You have an unread message. Visit a Delivery Moogle to read it.
Widget.MailIndicator.Tooltip.Plural: You have {0} unread messages. Visit a Delivery Moogle to read them.
Widget.MailIndicator.Config.Decorate.Des: Decorates the mail indicator widget with a background and border.
Widget.MailIndicator.Config.AlwaysShow.D: Always show the mail indicator, even when there is no mail. The widget will show itself in a disabled state when there is no unread mail.
The vertical offset of the mail icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.Weather.Name: Weather Forecast
Widget.Weather.Description: Shows the current weather and the upcoming weather forecast for the next couple of hours.
Widget.Weather.Config.ShowIcon.Name: Show weather icon
Widget.Weather.Config.ShowIcon.Descripti: Whether to show the weather icon next to the weather name.
Widget.Weather.Config.IconLocation.Name: Icon location
Widget.Weather.Config.IconLocation.Descr: The location of the weather icon relative to the weather name.
Widget.Weather.Config.TextAlign.Name: Text alignment
Widget.Weather.Config.TextAlign.Descript: The alignment of the weather text.
Widget.Weather.Config.MaxForecastEntries: The maximum number of weather forecast entries to show in the popup when the widget is clicked. A value of 0 will prevent the popup from opening.
Widget.Weather.Config.Spacing.Name: Spacing between weather icon and text
Widget.Weather.Config.Spacing.Descriptio: The distance between the weather icon and the text. This setting only applies to the toolbar widget itself.
Widget.WorldName.Name: World Name
Widget.WorldName.Description: Shows the name of the current world. Has an option to hide itself when you are on your home world.
Hides the widget when you are on your home world. This can be useful to preserve space in the toolbar.
Widget.WorldName.Config.Decorate.Name: Decorate the widget
Widget.WorldName.Config.Decorate.Descrip: Decorates the widget with a background and border.
Widget.WorldName.Config.TextYOffset.Name: Text vertical offset
Widget.WorldName.Config.TextYOffset.Desc: The vertical offset of the text from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the text down, negative values move the text up.
Widget.WorldName.Config.ShowIcon.Name: Show the cross-world icon
Widget.WorldName.Config.ShowIcon.Descrip: Shows a small icon next to the world name to indicate that you are on a different world compared to your home world.
Widget.WorldName.Config.IconLocation.Des: The location of the cross-world icon relative to the world name.
Widget.MainMenu.Name: Main Menu Button
Widget.MainMenu.Description: Shows a button that opens the configured main menu.
Widget.MainMenu.Config.Category.Name: Menu category
Widget.MainMenu.Config.Category.Descript: The category of the main menu that should be opened when the button is clicked.
Widget.MainMenu.Config.DisplayMode.Name: Display mode
Widget.MainMenu.Config.DisplayMode.Descr: The way the main menu button should be displayed.
Widget.MainMenu.Config.IconLocation.Name: Icon location
Widget.MainMenu.Config.IconLocation.Desc: The location of the icon relative to the text.
Widget.MainMenu.Config.CustomIconId.Name: Custom icon ID
Widget.MainMenu.Config.CustomIconId.Desc: The custom icon ID that should be used for the main menu button. This can be used to override the default icon. Use the command "/xldata icons" to browse available icons to get the correct ID. Use ID 0 to use the default icon.
Widget.MainMenu.Config.GrayscaleIcon.Des: Desaturates the icon to make it appear in grayscale. This can be a bit more subtle and pleasing to the eye.
Widget.MainMenu.Config.IconSize.Name: Custom icon size
Widget.MainMenu.Config.IconSize.Descript: A custom size for the button icon in pixels. Set to 0 to use the default size.
Widget.MainMenu.Config.ShowItemIcons.Nam: Show item icons in the menu
Widget.MainMenu.Config.ShowItemIcons.Des: Whether to show icons in the popup menu for items that have icons associated with them.
Widget.MainMenu.Config.GrayscaleIcons.De: Desaturates the icons in the popup menu to make them appear in grayscale. This can be a bit more subtle and pleasing to the eye.
Widget.MainMenu.Config.Decorate.Name: Decorate the button
Widget.MainMenu.Config.Decorate.Descript: Decorates the main menu button with a background and border.
Widget.MainMenu.Config.TextYOffset.Name: Text vertical offset
Widget.MainMenu.Config.TextYOffset.Descr: The vertical offset of the text from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the text down, negative values move the text up.
Widget.Currencies.Name: Currencies
Widget.Currencies.Description: Shows the current amount of gil and company credits.
Widget.Currencies.Config.TrackedCurrency: The currency that should be tracked and displayed in the widget on the toolbar.
Widget.Currencies.Config.ShowIcon.Name: Show tracked currency icon
Widget.Currencies.Config.ShowIcon.Descri: Whether to show the icon of the tracked currency next to the text.
Widget.Currencies.Config.ShowName.Name: Show tracked currency name
Widget.Currencies.Config.ShowName.Descri: Whether to show the name of the tracked currency next to the value.
Widget.Currencies.Config.IconLocation.De: The location of the icon relative to the text.
Widget.Currencies.Config.CustomWidgetLab: A custom label that should be displayed when no currency is being tracked. Leave empty to use the default label.
Widget.Currencies.Config.Decorate.Name: Decorate the widget
Widget.Currencies.Config.Decorate.Descri: Decorates the currency widget with a background and border.
Desaturates the icon of the tracked currency to make it appear in grayscale.
Widget.Currencies.Config.DesaturateIcons: Desaturates the icons in the popup menu to make them appear in grayscale. This can be a bit more subtle and pleasing to the eye.
Widget.Currencies.Config.TextYOffset.Des: The vertical offset of the text from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the text down, negative values move the text up.
Widget.ToolbarPin.Name: Toolbar Pin
Widget.ToolbarPin.Description: A simple button that allows you to toggle the toolbar's auto-hide feature.
Widget.ToolbarPin.Config.Decorate.Name: Decorate the button
Widget.ToolbarPin.Config.Decorate.Descri: Decorates the toolbar pin button with a background and border.
Widget.ToolbarPin.Config.IconYOffset.Des: The vertical offset of the lock icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values moves the icon down, negative values moves it up.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Name: Gearset Switcher
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Description: Shows your currently equipped gearset and some statistics about it. The popup of this widget provides you with an organized overview of all your gearsets, categorized by role.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.DeleteButtonToolt: Click while holding the SHIFT key to delete this gearset
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.DisplayMod: The way the gearset switcher widget should be displayed.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.IconLocati: The location of the icon relative to the text.
The alignment of the gearset switcher widget text.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.Decorate.D: Decorates the gearset switcher widget with a background and border.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.ShowRoleNa: Whether to show the role names in the popup.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.UseAlterna: Uses an alternate version of a job icon in the toolbar widget when enabled.
Use alternate icon in the popup header
Uses an alternate version of a job icon in the popup header when enabled.
Use alternate icon in the gearset buttons
Uses an alternate version of a job icon in the gearset buttons in the popup when enabled.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.IconYOffse: The vertical offset of the job icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.HeaderIcon: The vertical offset of the job icon from the center of the popup header in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.ButtonIcon: The vertical offset of the job icon from the center of the gearset buttons in the popup in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.NameTextYO: The vertical offset of the name text from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the text down, negative values move the text up.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.InfoTextYO: The vertical offset of the info text from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the text down, negative values move the text up.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.ShowRole.D: Whether to show the gearsets associated with this role in the popup.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.RoleLocati: The location of the gearsets associated with this role in the popup.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.RoleSortIn: The order in which the roles are displayed in the popup within the configured column. Lower values are displayed first.
Widget.GearsetSwitcher.Config.RoleMaxIte: The maximum number of gearsets to show for this role before the list starts to scroll.
Widget.OnlineStatus.Name: Online Status
Widget.OnlineStatus.Description: Shows your current online status and gives you the option to change it.
Widget.OnlineStatus.Tooltip: Right-click to open the search info window.
Widget.OnlineStatus.Config.ShowName.Name: Show status name
Widget.OnlineStatus.Config.ShowName.Desc: Whether to show the name of the current status next to the icon.
The location of the icon relative to the text.
Widget.OnlineStatus.Config.Decorate.Name: Decorate the widget
Widget.OnlineStatus.Config.Decorate.Desc: Decorates the online status widget with a background and border.
Widget.OnlineStatus.Config.TextYOffset.D: The vertical offset of the text from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the text down, negative values move the text up.
Widget.OnlineStatus.Config.IconYOffset.D: The vertical offset of the icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.MarkerControl.Name: World Marker Control
Widget.MarkerControl.Description: Allows you to quickly toggle world marker types on and off from a popup menu.
Widget.MarkerControl.Config.Decorate.Des: Decorates the marker control widget with a background and border.
The vertical offset of the marker icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.Volume.Name: Volume Control
Widget.Volume.Description: Allows you to control the volume of different audio channels in the game.
Widget.Volume.Option.SoundHousing: Play city-state music in residential areas
Widget.Volume.Option.SoundHousing.Descri: Requires you to re-enter the area to take effect.
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowOptions.Name: Show additional sound options
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowOptions.Descrip: Shows additional sound options in the popup menu to control specific settings related to music.
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowBgm.Name: Show Background Music
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowBgm.Description: Shows the background music volume control in the popup menu.
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowSfx.Name: Show Sound Effects
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowSfx.Description: Shows the sound effects volume control in the popup menu.
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowVoc.Name: Show Voice Volume
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowVoc.Description: Shows the voice volume control in the popup menu.
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowAmb.Name: Show Ambient Volume
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowAmb.Description: Shows the environment volume control in the popup menu.
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowSys.Name: Show System Sounds
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowSys.Description: Shows the system sounds volume control in the popup menu.
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowPerf.Name: Show Bard Performance Volume
Widget.Volume.Config.ShowPerf.Descriptio: Shows the bard performance volume control in the popup menu.
Widget.Volume.Config.Decorate.Name: Decorate the widget
Widget.Volume.Config.Decorate.Descriptio: Decorates the marker control widget with a background and border.
Widget.Volume.Config.IconYOffset.Name: Icon vertical offset
Widget.Volume.Config.IconYOffset.Descrip: The vertical offset of the marker icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.Companion.Name: Companion
Widget.Companion.Description: Provides quick access to summon or dismiss your chocobo companion, as well as change its stance.
Widget.Companion.Decorate.Name: Decorate the widget
Widget.Companion.Decorate.Description: Decorates the companion widget with a background and border.
Widget.Companion.Config.IconYOffset.Name: Icon vertical offset
Widget.Companion.Config.IconYOffset.Desc: The vertical offset of the companion icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.Companion.Config.DisplayMode.Name: Widget display mode
Widget.Companion.Config.DisplayMode.Desc: The way the gearset switcher widget should be displayed.
Widget.Companion.Config.IconLocation.Des: The location of the icon relative to the text.
Widget.Companion.Config.TextAlign.Name: Text alignment
Widget.Companion.Config.TextAlign.Descri: The alignment of the gearset switcher widget text.
Widget.CustomButton.Name: Custom Button
Widget.CustomButton.Description: A customizable button that can be used to execute a command.
Widget.CustomButton.Config.Label.Name: Button label
Widget.CustomButton.Config.Label.Descrip: The text that is displayed on the button.
Widget.CustomButton.Config.Command.Name: Command
Widget.CustomButton.Config.Command.Descr: The command that is executed when the button is clicked. For example: /dance.
Widget.CustomButton.Config.Decorate.Name: Decorate the button
Widget.CustomButton.Config.Decorate.Desc: Decorates the custom button with a background and border.
Widget.CustomButton.Config.IconYOffset.D: The vertical offset of the icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.CustomButton.Config.TextYOffset.D: The vertical offset of the text from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the text down, negative values move the text up.
Widget.CustomButton.Config.LeftIconId.De: The icon ID that should be displayed on the left side of the button. Use the command "/xldata icons" to browse available icons to get the correct ID. Use ID 0 to hide the icon.
Widget.CustomButton.Config.RightIconId.D: The icon ID that should be displayed on the right side of the button. Use the command "/xldata icons" to browse available icons to get the correct ID. Use ID 0 to hide the icon.
Widget.ItemButton.Name: Item Button
Widget.ItemButton.Description: A customizable button that can be used to use an item from your inventory, provided you have the item in your inventory.
Widget.ItemButton.Config.ItemId.Name: Item ID
Widget.ItemButton.Config.ItemId.Descript: The ID of the item to use when the button is clicked. Use SimpleTweaks' "Show ID" tooltip tweak to find the correct ID of items in your inventory.
Widget.ItemButton.Config.Decorate.Name: Decorate the button
Widget.ItemButton.Config.Decorate.Descri: Decorates the custom button with a background and border.
Widget.ItemButton.Config.ShowLabel.Name: Show button label
Widget.ItemButton.Config.ShowLabel.Descr: Whether to show the label of the button that contains the item name.
Widget.ItemButton.Config.IconLocation.De: The location of the icon relative to the text.
Widget.ItemButton.Config.IconYOffset.Des: The vertical offset of the icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.ItemButton.Config.TextYOffset.Des: The vertical offset of the text from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the text down, negative values move the text up.
Widget.Flag.Name: Flag Marker
Widget.Flag.Description: Shows a widget that appears when a flag marker has been set that allows you to teleport to a nearby aetheryte.
Widget.Flag.Tooltip:
Left-click to teleport to a nearby aetheryte.
Right-click to remove the flag marker.
Widget.Flag.Config.Decorate.Name: Decorate the widget
Widget.Flag.Config.Decorate.Description: Decorates the flag marker widget with a background and border.
Widget.Flag.Config.IconYOffset.Name: Icon vertical offset
Widget.Flag.Config.IconYOffset.Descripti: The vertical offset of the flag icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
Widget.Flag.Config.IconLocation.Name: Icon location
Widget.Flag.Config.IconLocation.Descript: The location of the flag icon relative to the text.
Widget.Flag.Config.TextAlign.Name: Text alignment
Widget.Flag.Config.TextAlign.Description: The alignment of the flag marker widget text.
Widget.Flag.Error.NoAetheryte: No nearby aetheryte found to teleport to.
Widget.WalkingIndicator.Name: Walking Indicator
Widget.WalkingIndicator.Description: Shows an indicator that appears when you are walking instead of running.
Decorates the walking indicator widget with a background and border.
Widget.WalkingIndicator.Config.IconYOffs: The vertical offset of the walking icon from the center of the widget in pixels. Positive values move the icon down, negative values move the icon up.
ColorGroup.Window.Name: Window Colors

ColorGroup.Input.Name: Input Controls Colors
ColorGroup.Input.Description: Colors that are used for input controls, such as buttons, checkboxes and input fields.

ColorGroup.Widget.Name: Widget Colors
ColorGroup.Widget.Description: Colors that are used to style the toolbar widgets and their popups.

Color.Window.TitlebarCloseButton.Name: Close button

Color.Window.TitlebarCloseButtonBorder.D: The border color of the close button.
Color.Window.TitlebarCloseButtonHover.De: The hover color of the close button.
Color.Window.TitlebarCloseButtonX.Name: Close button X

Color.Window.Text.Description: The default text color in a window.

Color.Window.TextMuted.Description: A muted color for less prominent text.

Color.Window.TextOutline.Description: The outline color for window text.

OOBE.Title: Umbra First-Time Setup
OOBE.DontShowAgain.Name: Don't show this window again on startup
OOBE.DontShowAgain.Description: You can always access this window from the plugin settings.
OOBE.Welcome.Title: Welcome to Umbra
OOBE.Welcome.Content.Body: Umbra is a powerful plugin that enhances your Final Fantasy XIV experience with a wide range of features and customization options. This setup wizard will guide you through the initial configuration of the plugin.
OOBE.Welcome.Content.Body2: You can always change any of these settings later in the plugin settings window, by typing "/umbra" in the chat.
OOBE.ToolbarWidgets.Title: Toolbar Setup
OOBE.ToolbarWidgets.Content.Header: Do you want a pre-configured toolbar?
OOBE.ToolbarWidgets.Content.Body: One of Umbra's main features is the toolbar, which contains a variety of customizable widgets that provide quick access to useful information and actions. You can choose to start with a pre-configured toolbar, or start fresh and leave it empty so you can customize it later.
OOBE.ToolbarWidgets.Prefill.Name: Yes, I want a pre-configured toolbar!
OOBE.ToolbarWidgets.Prefill.Description: This will add a few basic widgets to the toolbar to get you started. You can always customize it via the plugin settings window.
OOBE.ToolbarBehavior.Title: Toolbar Look & Feel
OOBE.ToolbarBehavior.Description: Let's make it act the way you want.
OOBE.ToolbarBehavior.Content.Body: Let's set up the way the toolbar positions itself and the way it behaves. You can change its appearance later in the plugin settings window.
OOBE.ToolbarBehavior.TopAligned: I want the toolbar at the top of the screen
OOBE.ToolbarBehavior.Stretched: I want the toolbar to stretch across the screen
OOBE.ToolbarBehavior.AutoHide: I want the toolbar to automatically hide itself
OOBE.Finish.Title: All set!
OOBE.Finish.Description: You're all set up and ready to go.
OOBE.Finish.Content.Body: You're all set up and ready to go. Enjoy using Umbra!
OOBE.Finish.Content.Body2: You can always access the plugin settings by typing "/umbra" in the chat. Umbra has a dedicated support channel on the XIV Launcher & Dalamud Discord server where you can ask questions and get help.
OOBE.Finish.OpenSettings.Name: Open plugin settings after closing this window
OOBE.Finish.OpenSettings.Description: This will open the plugin settings window after you hit the "Finish" button so you can further customize your Umbra experience.
